P

paintBackground(Graphics) - Method in class main.Board
Method to paint both images, the background and the template of the main rectangle, next Tetros rect and stored rect.
paintBoardLines(Graphics) - Method in class main.Board
Method to paint the main rectangle grid lines.
paintBoardMatrix(Graphics) - Method in class main.Board
Method to paint all the values of the matrix, with a specific color depending on the stored value.
paintComponent(Graphics) - Method in class main.Board
Method override from JPanel to paint everything in the game.
paintComponent(Graphics) - Method in class main.MainMenu
 
paintCurrentTetromino(Graphics) - Method in class main.Board
Method to paint the current Tetromino.
paintFourNextTetrominos(Graphics) - Method in class main.Board
Method to paint the Tetrominos on the right column.
paintInfo(Graphics) - Static method in class main.Main
Paints the info of the current state of the game.
paintLoose(Graphics) - Method in class main.Board
Method to paint the You Loose text.
paintNextTetrominosLines(Graphics) - Method in class main.Board
Method to paint right rectangle grid lines of next Tetrominos.
paintStoredTetromino(Graphics) - Method in class main.Board
Method to paint each block of the Tetrominos attached to the Board matrix.
paintStoredTetrominoLines(Graphics) - Method in class main.Board
Method to paint the right rectangle grid lines that stores a Tetromino.
paintTexts(Graphics) - Method in class main.Board
Method to paint the texts of the scene.
play - Variable in class main.MainMenu
 
playerAlive - Static variable in class main.Board
 
positionsToAttachToBoardMatrix() - Method in class main.Tetromino
Method to get the position of each block of the Tetromino in MATRIX coordinates.
